section.name: Goal
section.p: The goal of user service is to create a runtime user session framework for common application. The user service can work without servlet, even without Turbine, but Fulcrum is essential.
Once the user service is started, developers can add more listeners to add operation into Signin/Signout process. Also, these listeners are independent to Servlet and Turbine.

section.name: Configuration
section.p: Open WEB-INF/conf/tornado.properties file, we can find this part of configuration.
section.source:
services.UserService.classname = com.cyclops.tornado.services.user.DefaultUserService services.UserService.user.earlyInit = true
#services.UserService.user.interval = 1000 #services.UserService.user.timeout = 1800000 services.UserService.user.implementation = com.cyclops.tornado.TornadoUser services.UserService.listener = com.cyclops.tornado.modules.PassportBuilder #services.UserService.listener = com.mycompany.myproject.modules.MyUserListener
section.p: earlyInit is true since many other features are based on UserService.
